TextView.android:text: Sana - Reusable Sanitary Pads\nSaNa, an abbreviation for Sanitary Napkin, means comfort or softness. SaNa is a project initiated by Enactus Shivaji College under which resuable, biodegradable sanitary napkins are produced keeping in mind the health of women as well as our planet earth. Shockingly, even today a majority of women still use cloth instead of a proper sanitary napkin not because they are not aware, but because of the heavy prices of the pad. Enactus Shivaji willing to tackle this problem, is providing a solution by producing reusable sanitary napkins. Not only will the pads be pocket friendly but they will also keep the women healthier than usual by preventing diseases.
